meta.title: XEN Crypto - Cryptocurrency For The Masses
meta.description: XEN Crypto is a community-driven, self-custodial cryptocurrency built on the principles of decentralization, transparency, and trust.

hero.title: Cryptocurrency For The Masses
hero.subtitle: XEN Crypto is the world's first fair-launch, community-driven protocol. Free to mint. Cross-chain. Fully decentralized.

crossChain.title: Cross-Chain Overview
crossChain.subtitle: Real-time on-chain data across all supported networks

features.title: Why XEN Crypto?
features.fairLaunchDesc: No pre-mine, no admin keys, no sacrifice. Everyone starts equal.
features.multiChainDesc: Deployed on 13+ blockchains for maximum accessibility.
features.selfCustodialDesc: Your keys, your crypto. XEN is fully trustless and transparent.
features.proofOfParticipationDesc: Mining rewards based on time commitment and global rank.
features.communityDrivenDesc: Built by the community, for the community. Open source forever.
features.immutableDesc: No admin keys. No one can change the rules. True hyperstructure.
